title: 6 STEPS TAKEN TO CORRECT PAST manufacturer. REPORTABLE CONDITIONS—Management of Foamex L.P., under the guidance of the Foamex 2003 Sales: international audit committee, is in the process of $1.3 billion remediating the reportable conditions. Foamex L.P. continues to install a new enterprise-wide information Auditor: technology system. Foamex L.P. expects to Deloitte & Touche substantially complete the implementation during 2006. Several modules of the system have already been installed and others are currently in the process of being implemented
